bill.title: Relating to the Department of State Lands; prescribing an effective date.
bill.description: Authorizes Director of Department of State Lands to adopt rules establishing fees related to removal or fill permit applications, wetland delineation reports and general authorizations. Authorizes Director of Department of State Lands to adopt rules establishing fees related to removal or fill permit applications, wetland delineation reports and general authorizations. Removes specified fee amounts from statute. Authorizes method by which Department of State Lands may dispose of personal property left on state lands. Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
